scene_target: Artie arrives in the tutorial zone and faces his first threat, realizing the lethality of his 1 HP build.
goal: Establish the mechanical reality of the 'Glass Cannon' build through environmental tension and a mob encounter.
conflict: Artie's confusion and extreme physical vulnerability versus a predatory Level 1 Slime.
end_condition: Artie is cornered by the slime and realizes that a single point of damage will end his journey.

last_scene: Artie arrived in the Lush Forest tutorial zone and was immediately confronted by the reality of his 1 HP build.
A Lesser Puddle Slime attacked, forcing Artie to realize that he must dodge every single attack to survive.
key_events: Artie spawns in the Lush Forest with his Corporate ID Badge and Cracked Smartphone.
The System initiates the 'Survive the Spawn' quest.
Artie confirms his stats: Level 1, 1/1 HP, and 100% Crit Rate.
A Lesser Puddle Slime (Lvl 1) aggros on Artie.
Artie successfully dodges the slime's first leap, consuming 5 stamina.
Artie is cornered against a thicket of thorns as the slime prepares a second lunge.

injury: vending machine scar on right knuckle
